line_1: How Time, all-wasting, ev'n the worst impairs,
line_2: Our sires, more vicious ev'n than theirs,

line_1: How Time, all-wasting, ev'n the worst impairs,
line_2: Left us, still more degenerate heirs,

line_1: "Vice wastes their vigour, and their mind impairs.
line_2: "A youth of follies; and old age, of cares:

line_1: Who wisely checks, but not impairs
line_2: Give it the Bard, who boldly dares
